biography.bio: Wolf Albach-Retty (1906-1967) was one of those actors full of charm, presence and wit the Ausrian and German cinema of yore knew the secret for. That he became an actor comes as no surprise considering that his mother, Rosa Albach-Retty, was a star of the Viennese stage. Of course, Magda Schneider, the woman he married in 1936, was an actress. And logically indeed they begot another famous actress by the name of ... Romy Schneider. Unfortunately, being Romy's father is probably Wolf Albach-Retty's greatest claim for glory, for despite his acting talents he privileged - lock, stock and barrel - commercial cinema, opting for romance films, superficial musicals and mediocre comedies which pleased the crowds but did not make film history. Too bad because his acting talents would have been welcome in the world of Max Ophüls, Wolfgang Liebeneiner or Helmut Käutner, among others. His theater career was much more satisfactory, notably his acclaimed performances in plays by Athur Schnitler.
biography.name: Wolf Albach-Retty

biography.bio: Elfe Gerhart was born on July 10, 1919 in Vienna, Austria as Elfriede Gerhart. She was an actress, known for Verlorenes Rennen (1948), Halbe Wahrheiten (1972) and Amour et musique (1947). She was married to Paul Dahlke. She died on November 9, 2007 in Grundlsee, Styria, Austria.
biography.name: Elfe Gerhart

biography.bio: Inge Konradi was born on July 27, 1924 in Vienna, Austria. She was an actress, known for O Palmenbaum (2000), Single Bells (1998) and Kaiser Joseph und die Bahnwärterstochter (1962). She was married to Wander Bertoni. She died on February 4, 2002 in Vienna.
biography.name: Inge Konradi

biography.birthName: Gustav Theodore Clemens Robert Freiherr Von Rummel
biography.bio: Gustav Waldau was born on February 27, 1871 in Ergolding, Bavaria, Germany as Gustav Theodore Clemens Robert Freiherr Von Rummel. He was an actor, known for Der kleine Muck (1944), Die Medaille (1955) and Sie und die Drei (1935). He was married to Herta Von Hagen. He died on May 25, 1958 in Munich, Bavaria.
biography.name: Gustav Waldau

biography.bio: Walter Müller was born on May 6, 1911 in Prague, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for La femme de mes rêves (1944), Einmal keine Sorgen haben (1953) and Bravo je suis papa! (1953). He died on March 2, 1969 in Starnberg, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Walter Müller

biography.bio: Waltraut Haas was born on June 9, 1927 in Vienna, Austria as Waltraute Haas. She is an actress, known for Mon ami le clown (1955), Premier avril an 2000 (1952) and The White Horse Inn (1960). She was previously married to Erwin Strahl.
biography.name: Waltraut Haas

biography.bio: Greta Zimmer was born on December 9, 1922 in Vienna, Austria. She was an actress, known for Die vergessenen Jahre (1962), Das Ereignis (1969) and Biedermann und die Brandstifter (1963). She died on July 28, 2003 in Vienna.
biography.name: Greta Zimmer
